languages.text: "Пожалуй". {n}Винтерскейл прикрывает глаза, разгадав ваши помыслы.{/n} "Как бы то ни было я рад, что умру именно от твоей руки. До встречи на той стороне, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Пожалуй". {n}Винтерскейл прикрывает глаза, разгадав ваши помыслы.{/n} "Как бы то ни было я рад, что умру именно от твоей руки. До встречи на той стороне, {name}".

languages.text: "You have a point." {n}Calligos closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am glad that it is at your hand that I die. I shall see you on the other side, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Пожалуй". {n}Винтерскейл прикрывает глаза, разгадав ваши помыслы.{/n} "Как бы то ни было я рад, что умру именно от твоей руки. До встречи на той стороне, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "I guess so." {n}Winterscale closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I'm glad it's your hand I will die by. See you on the other side, {name}."
"I guess so." {n}Winterscale closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I'm glad it's your hand I will die by. See you on the other side, {name}."
"I guess so." {n}Winterscale closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I'm glad it's your hand I will die by. See you on the other side, {name}."
"I guess so." {n}Winterscale closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I'm glad it's your hand I will die by. See you on the other side, {name}."
"You have a point." {n}Calligos closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am glad that it is at your hand that I die. I shall see you on the other side, {name}."
"You have a point." {n}Calligos closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am glad that it is at your hand that I die. I shall see you on the other side, {name}."

languages.text: «No le falta razón». {n}Calligos cierra los ojos, anticipándose a tus intenciones.{/n} «Sin embargo, no me importa morir a sus manos. Le veré al otro lado, {name}».
languages.original_text: "You have a point." {n}Calligos closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am glad that it is at your hand that I die. I shall see you on the other side, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que no». {n}Winterscale cierra los ojos, habiendo adivinado tus intenciones.{/n} «Pese a todo, me alegra que sea su mano la que me dé muerte. Nos veremos al otro lado, {name}».

languages.text: “你的话很有道理。”{n}卡里戈斯闭上眼睛，猜到了你的意图。{/n}“尽管如此，我很高兴能死在你手里。咱们另一边再会吧，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "You have a point." {n}Calligos closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am glad that it is at your hand that I die. I shall see you on the other side, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “我猜也是。”{n}温特斯凯尔闭上眼睛，猜到了你的意图。{/n}“尽管如此，我很高兴能死在你手里。咱们另一边再会吧，{name}。”

languages.text: « Non, c'est vrai. {n}Ayant deviné vos intentions, Calligos ferme les yeux.{/n} Quoi qu'il en soit, je suis heureux de mourir de votre main. À bientôt dans l'au-delà, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "You have a point." {n}Calligos closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am glad that it is at your hand that I die. I shall see you on the other side, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Non, c'est vrai. » {n}Ayant deviné vos intentions, Winterscale ferme les yeux.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, je suis heureux de mourir de votre main. À bientôt dans l'au-delà, {name}. »

languages.text: 「そうだな」{n}あなたの意図を察したウィンタースケールは目を閉じる。{/n}「それでも、俺が死ぬのがお前の手によるものでよかったと思う。あの世でまた会おう、{name}」
languages.original_text: "You have a point." {n}Calligos closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am glad that it is at your hand that I die. I shall see you on the other side, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな」{n}あなたの意図を察したウィンタースケールは目を閉じる。{/n}「それでも、俺が死ぬのがお前の手によるものでよかったと思う。あの世でまた会おう、{name}」

languages.text: "Ihr habt nicht unrecht." {n}Calligos schließt die Augen, nachdem er deine Absichten erraten hat.{/n} "Dennoch bin ich froh, dass ich durch Eure Hand sterben werde. Wir sehen uns auf der anderen Seite, {name}."
languages.original_text: "You have a point." {n}Calligos closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am glad that it is at your hand that I die. I shall see you on the other side, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Mag sein." {n}Winterzunder schließt die Augen, nachdem er deine Absichten erraten hat.{/n} "Dennoch, ich bin froh, dass ich durch Eure Hand sterben werde. Wir sehen uns auf der anderen Seite, {name}."

languages.text: "Haklısın." {n}Calligos, niyetini tahmin ederek gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Her hâlükârda ölümüm senin elinden olacağı için memnunum. Diğer tarafta görüşmek üzere {name}."
languages.original_text: "You have a point." {n}Calligos closes his eyes, having guessed your intentions.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am glad that it is at your hand that I die. I shall see you on the other side, {name}."
